title: Bildval
desc: Guess what picture matches the given product name.
easy.desc: Guess only the most popular products!
question: What is... {{product}}?
how_to_play.title: Bildval: How to play
how_to_play.desc.1: You will be given an IKEA product name. Pick the picture that best identifies the product.
how_to_play.desc.2: There are {{rounds}} rounds. Each round, you will be given a new name to identify.
how_to_play.desc.3: If you are stuck, you can pass/skip the round. You have {{passes}} passes per game.
how_to_play.multiplier: Multiplier increases by 1 each round if you pass, max {{max}}. If you fail, the multiplier resets to 1.
